description: Today we go back in time to when I first met Kane more than ten years ago. Kane's a nice tight bundle of young spunk, weighing in at 160 pounds and 5'9' of pure army eye-candy. At the time of the recording he was 23, and he was playing pretty coy about how willing he'd be to take things further with dudes like his buddy Landon had. So for today, Kane's not the dick-hungry pig he'd turn out to be, he's still just a wide-eyed first-timer showing off to get our affection. You can see it in the smirk he gives the camera as he unbuckles his pants that he knows he's hot shit. Once his dick starts poking out of the hole in his boxers, he knows he's got our attention.Kane's army pride sticks with him through and through, and the undies come off but the dog tags stay on as he gets his hard dick all worked up. You'll get to see plenty of Kane's front side and back side, after I convince him I'm not letting him go until he flaunts his hot hole for the camera. He plays hard to get at first, but by the final cut I count over 4 minutes of uninterrupted ass in your face ... doesn't seem like he really minded in the end, now does it?
title: Kane, Scene #01
